snippet.title: Official Announce Trailer | SECOND-LOOP™
snippet.description:
「チャンネル登録」 Hit subscribe to support SECOND-LOOP and latest news! (づ ◕‿◕ )づ 
https://second-loop.com/
https://twitter.com/KakaruStudio

SECOND-LOOP™ is a single-player FPS action game with sandbox physics puzzle solving, — you're the robot pilot in the heart of a futuristic dystopian world. Control your mech in intense combat, and use your ability to manipulate gravity + assemble mechanical parts to solve physics puzzles.

Action / FPS / Singleplayer / Puzzle / Sandbox / Mech / Indie game.

Steam Page Open : May 1st, 2024
